Texts.Chs: 没有迹象表明这到底意味着什么，但如果Tiss参与了，那么死亡肯定就在她身后不远的地方。她只是一个特工。毫无疑问,我们“仁慈”的领导已经注意到，我们在任何时候都有几十个活跃分子，我个人认为，他们正试图加强联盟，以进行公开的敌对行动.
Texts.Eng: No indication was given as to what exactly that meant, but if Tiss is involved there is most certainly death following not far behind her. And that's just one agent. Undoubtedly our 'benign' leadership has seen to it that we have dozens active at any point, and it is my personal belief that they are attempting to strengthen the League for open hostilities with

Texts.Chs: 只要有可能，我们更喜欢与世隔绝，远离其他物种窥探的目光。至少，这是我们对事物的理解。很不幸，委员会似乎对银河系另有计划。就在上个星期，我收到消息说Veilak Tiss(是的，杀死Gressvels的杀手)被激活来直接帮助解决问题。
Texts.Eng: We prefer to remain isolated whenever possible, away from the prying eyes of other species. At least, that was my understanding of things. The Council, unfortunately, appears to have other plans for the galaxy. Just last week I received word that Veilak Tiss (yes, the assassin responsible for Gressvels demise) was being activated to help with matters directly.

Texts.Chs: 保护国的力量现在处于最薄弱的阶段。一个被毁灭的家园，在这样的悲剧之后，我们的委员会还想攻击他们?不可想象的。他们应该记住入侵后我们的世界发生了什么。我再也不能忍受这个人渣了。你可以打赌，他们已经等了几个世纪才打出这张牌，现在时机已经成熟。
Texts.Eng: the forces of the Protectorate now that they are at their weakest. A homeworld -obliterated-, and our council wants to attack them after such a tragedy? Unthinkable. They should instead remember what happened to *our* world after an invasion. I cannot stand this scum any longer. You can bet that they have waited centuries to play this card, and the time is ripe.
